name: UnofficialPathTrainGuide
0:
”Alexa, ask Train Guide train from hoboken to newport”
”Alexa, ask Train Guide next train from grove street to world trade center”
”Alexa , open Train Guide”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: train guide
des:
Users can ask for the next train from a particular station on the PATH train route. 

To get started, user can say "Alexa, Ask train guide, help". 

To ask for the next train from Hoboken to Newport, user can say "Alexa, Ask train guide next train from Hoboken to Newport" or "Alexa, Ask train guide, Hoboken to Newport"

This skill is not sponsored or endorsed by The Port Authority of New York and New Jersey.
